open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Track process state in SA when possible

Processes can be either detached, joined, or joinable.
Static analyser could (at least in some cases) detect the state and
complain when the program wants to, for example, join a process that
has already been joined.

This would require implementing "richer" type representations for SA.
Currently it only knows types of values, but no details.
It could, however, know about bit string widths, text contents, vector
lengths, etc.
